Text: In this Main Plot, the Hero will begin his journey by visiting an extremely poor town. A Cult is collecting money for the inhabitants, but things might be very different...

A Hero in need of rest notice a small town close to his position. When he arrives, he discovers a town plunged into diseases and poverty. While he is looking around him, a priest from an unknown cult approaches and ask for money to help the people.
The cultist kindly thanks you the Hero for his generosity. But a lurk in the eye of the mendicant makes the Hero realize it was a trickery.
The Hero decides chase the Cultist.
The Hero decides to ask to the inhabitants of the slums where is located the headquarter of the Cult.
The Hero finally breaks into the headquarter. There is no sign of the mendicant.
The Hero decides to sneak through the building to find him.
The Hero chooses to fight all the guards of the cult to find his goods.

Instead of finding the mendicant, the Hero enters the treasure room of the cult. While he is going to take some Gold, a stranger makes his appearance. He presents himself as one of the Theophilus' apprentice, Midas the Prophet of Mendicity.
